headline: CenterPoint Energy completes $1.2B sale of Louisiana, Mississippi gas systems
summary: The purchaser, private equity-backed Delta Utilities, says it also is “in the final stages” of acquiring Entergy's two regulated gas distribution companies in Louisiana.
